message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for $10,000. I believe it will be very beneficial for you.
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $10,000 is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $9,000?
Alice,  $9,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to go up to $8,250. If you're not willing to come down a little more, I'll have to take my business elsewhere.
